name: Sandy Patrol
description:
Sandy Patrol

Developed for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2020.

Despite closing down the beach, hundreds of visitors just won't stop trying to get through anyways! Don't let even one of them get past the entrance - send them all packing before the situation gets out of control!

Click on a visitor to try to ward them off. You may receive occasional assistance, but don't count on it too much! Can you hold out for 5 minutes?
